tests.prompt: Create a Monk with higher DEX than STR. Make an unarmed strike. Verify DEX modifier is used for attack and damage.
Create a Monk attacking with a shortsword (monk weapon). Verify DEX modifier can be used for attack and damage.
Create a level 1 Monk. Make an unarmed strike. Verify damage is 1d4 + modifier.
Monk uses Attack action with unarmed strike or monk weapon. Verify bonus action unarmed strike is available.
Create a level 2 Monk. Verify Ki points equals 2 (monk level).
Spend Ki points, then take a short rest. Verify Ki points are fully restored.
Activate Flurry of Blows after Attack action. Verify two unarmed strikes are granted as bonus action and 1 Ki is spent.
Activate Patient Defense. Verify Dodge is granted as bonus action and 1 Ki is spent. Attackers should have disadvantage.
Activate Step of the Wind for Disengage. Verify Disengage is granted as bonus action and 1 Ki is spent.
Create a level 3 Monk not wearing armor. Verify +10 ft speed bonus is applied.
Create a Monk wearing armor. Verify Unarmored Movement bonus is NOT applied.
Monk is hit by a ranged weapon attack. Use reaction to Deflect Missiles. Verify damage is reduced by 1d10 + DEX + monk level.
Spend Ki points, save character, reload. Verify Ki point state persists correctly.
Save and load a Monk with Martial Arts condition. Verify condition persists and functions correctly.
